NekoDrive Usage

It's extremely simple:

 # download and install dokan 0.6.0 http://dokan-dev.net/en/
 # download and install .NET Framework 4.0
 # download and install Neko Drive (7zip is needed to extract the archive)
 # on ubuntu server you may have to specify the uid and gid of the export as the following example:

/folder 192.168.0.14(rw,no_subtree_check,sync,anonuid=1000,anongid=1000)
